Steve Loughran wrote:
> One strength of JSON is that its simplicity is like XMLRPC -the effort

You mean the spec is inconsistent and buggy but because it fits on one 
page it seems like it's simple on first pass?

I hear a lot of the bugs in XMLRPC have been fixed, but really it's 
"simplicity" is chimeric.
